p.k: In this week's episode Declan Rice and Mason Mount join us to discuss their friendship, we visit a Manchester United fan in Kenya and Shinji Okazaki tallks
A round-up of the greatest goals from around the world, including action from Ligue 1 and the Bundesliga

p.n: Women's FIH Olympic Qualifiers: Women's Hockey: GBR v CHL 2019
p.k: Action from the Women's FIH Olympic Qualifiers as Great Britain face Chile at Lee Valley in London in 2019
All the best action from the latest fixtures in the Gallagher Premiership, including Bath v Exeter, Northampton v Worcester, Harlequins v Bristol
Highlights from the Virgin Australia Supercars Championship race 27 on the Gold Coast
Highlights from race 28 of the Virgin Australia Supercars Championship from the Sandown 500
Fantasy sports is a $4 billion industry, but for all of its success, the story of the game's inception is little known. Part of the award-winning 30 for 30 series
The 'miracle' win of the 1980 US men's Olympic hockey team had a flip side: the devastating impact that game had on the Russian coaches and players
This documentary tells the remarkable story of the late Pat Summitt, ex-women's college basketball head coach, as it has never been told before
This 30 for 30 documentary examines how Sonny Vaccaro rose from Pennsylvania steel town roots to become one of the most powerful and influential men in basketball

p.n: 30 for 30: Winning Time: Reggie Miller vs The NY Knicks
p.k: Part of the award-winning 30 for 30 series, this documentary looks at how NBA legend Reggie Miller became an enemy to New York Knicks fans

p.n: 30 for 30: 30 for 30 When the Garden Was Eden
p.k: This 30 for 30 documentary chronicles the glory years of the New York Knicks, when they made the NBA Finals in three out of four seasons, winning two titles

p.n: Live: Champions League Throwback: Live: UCL Battles of Britain
p.k: A look back at the Champions League Battles of Britain. Relive all the drama and excitement from Man Utd v Chelsea (2008) and Arsenal v Man Utd (2009)
Go behind the scenes with the fans of West Ham United as they move to a new home after 112 years at Upton Park. Featuring Slaven Bilic, Mark Noble Mabel

p.n: BT Sport Films Shorts: State of Play: Dawn Astle
p.k: BT Sport Films Shorts is a series of documentaries offering insight into why sport matters to elite sportsmen and women and fans
This documentary chronicles boxing's long-awaited first meeting of Mike Tyson and Evander Holyfield in 1996, and the rematch seven months later
This documentary tells the story of the 1999 miracle that was Charismatic, a horse that emerged from nowhere to win the first two races in the Triple Crown
This documentary tells the dark fate of open-water free diver Audrey Mestre. Part of ESPN's Nine for IX series

p.n: 30 for 30: No Crossover: The Trial of Allen Iverson
p.k: In 1993, Allen Iverson went bowling in Hampton. What followed ended with the teen in jail and divided a city along racial lines. Part of the acclaimed 30 for 30 series
